text: Heather Mary Peace (born 16 June 1975) is an English actress, musician and LGBT rights activist. She is best known for portraying the roles of Sally 'Gracie' Fields in the ITV drama series London's Burning (1998–2002), Nikki Boston in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2012–2014), and Eve Unwin in the BBC soap opera EastEnders (2021–present). Peace has also portrayed roles on British dramas such as Emmerdale (1997), Ultimate Force (2005–2006), The Chase (2006–2007), Coronation Street (2008), and Lip Service (2010–2012). ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English pop singers Category:English LGBT people Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT singers Category:British LGBT rights activists Category:Actors from Bradford Category:Musicians from Bradford
title: Heather Peace
